description: This file declares interfaces, enums, and function prototypes for managing processes in a watchdog component. It includes process start/stop operations, service acknowledgment, and process info retrieval, forming part of the process management subsystem.

methods.name: startConfiguredProcessesAndWait
methods.description: Starts all configured processes and waits for any to terminate, typically called from main to initialize process management.

methods.name: getAllServiceProcessInfo
methods.description: Populates a linked list with process information for all known services; caller must free the list items.

methods.name: getAllServiceNames
methods.description: Fills a linked list with names of all known services; caller must free list items.

methods.name: acknowledgeServiceStarted
methods.description: Updates the last acknowledgment received time for a service if found.

methods.name: areAllServicesStarted
methods.description: Checks if all services have started and the watchdog init is complete.

methods.name: countServicesToBeAcknowledged
methods.description: Counts services expecting acknowledgment that have not yet acknowledged.

methods.name: countSinglePhaseServicesToBeAcknowledged
methods.description: Counts single-phase startup services pending acknowledgment.

methods.name: stopMonitoringService
methods.description: Disables restart on fail for a specified service; returns false if service not found.

methods.name: getServiceForName
methods.description: Retrieves a clone of a service definition matching the provided name; caller must free the returned object.

methods.name: operationOnAllProcesses
methods.description: Performs start/stop/restart operations on all known processes.

methods.name: operationOnSingleProcesses
methods.description: Performs an action on a specific process identified by service name.

methods.name: operationOnGroupOfProcesses
methods.description: Performs an operation on a group of processes identified by group name.

methods.name: startProcess
methods.description: Launches a service process with optional restart after crash.
